title: Individual Income Tax Filing: Itemized Deductions: Taxes Paid
notes:
Starting with 2004, a taxpayer could have elected to deduct State and local general sales taxes instead of State and local income taxes as itemized deductions on Schedule A. 

For additional information about the return filing requirements, see the annual reports, Statistics of Income-Individual Income Tax Returns at https://www.irs.gov/uac/soi-tax-stats-historical-data-tables.
